page.title: 06SATURDAY AT THE REDFERN'S
page.content: Dad is a bus driver,he went to work at {07.00.} At{08.30}Mum,Katy and I had breakfast- tea,Rice Krispies and a boiled egg. I watched T.V.,Katy went out to play and Mum went shopping. At{11.00}I cycled to the park to play football.Katy helped Mum to clean upstairs. For dinner I had sandwiches,Katy and Mum had spaghetti. Mum made some cakes and sewed some flags for the carnival.Katy and I went out to play. At{17.00}we had tea- savoury duck, sausage,egg and beans. We then watched T.V.{ At{18.20 }Dad came home then he helped me repair my bike.Katy had chips from the chip van.Katy & Mum had a bath & I watched football on T.V.with Dad. At{23.00}we went to bed.
